name: Baldwin Li
biography:
Baldwin Li (born March 1982) is an English film producer from Manchester, United Kingdom.

Li founded Honlodge Productions, his production company, in 2006.In 2011—alongside film director Mark Gill—Li co-wrote, produced, and co-edited the BAFTA and Academy Award-nominated The Voorman Problem, starring Martin Freeman and Tom Hollander.

England is Mine, Li's first feature in collaboration with Gill, premiered at the closing gala of Edinburgh International Film Festival on 2 July 2017.; 14/08/2023
